name: AMR-WB+, Extended Adaptive Multi-Rate - Wideband Speech Codec
description: Audio data compression scheme optimized for speech coding in GSM (Global System for Mobile Communications) and UMTS (Universal Mobile Telecommunications System).  AMR-WB+ is backward compatibile with AMR-WB.
